I love this game for its potential. Its so fun!

Thanks for listening to the community<3
Only thing I want to see now is vote to Forfiet!   This will prevent survivors from being held hostage in games (((though i dont mind farming games or rough games every now and then but just those really bad games like bubba hooking someone and standing there making everyone else either die or do gens, nurse slugging everyone out, Or Killer purposley Not killing you when you want to die and move on . etc etc))). This is the only issue i really have now as there are a lot of bad games you get "stuck" in with penalty keeping you there. Yes i understand no penalty people will abuse but 15 mins is too long to wait on 2nd DC and killers can keep you longer than that.  We need this.  I Know this would help a lot of us Dbd heads get more fun out of our time hope to see <3

PS:  IF YOUR NOT GONNA TAKE BILLY COOLDOWN OFF PLZ MAKE DOUBLE ENGRAVINGS BASE KIT.  He needs them to be viable & I dont want to have to put so much bp in him just to play him how he should be base.  With this way we can get the much needed benefit of Billies saw speed to stop loopers from making corners & also be able to run the cooldown addons to give us learning Billies some more missed saws before being punished!  Yes I know the good Billies may have a much easier time this way but there arent that many & thats my favorite killer in the game & it sucks when i can go WEEKS without seeing a billy ..  Something needs to change plz BRING BILLY BACK
The game is very fun and has a lot to do their is a lot of stuff to grind for in the game and is fun when you learn it

редактирую на 166 часов
ебал рот этой игры, файлы волшебным образом меняется во время игры и меня кикает с игры во время матча. ХУЙНЯ. ЕБАНАЯ. НЕ СОВЕТУЮ
The salt from everybody (including me) in this game is real.

the game runs like ass. the community is toxic, the devs are incompetent, overall not that fun. it can be fun if you play survivor with a full team of friend. playing killer is also not fun, meeting toxic survivors almost every game, facing strong perks and difficult maps. i like this game, but in this current state i can't recommend it to anyone. 
p.s: this game is capped at 60 fps, but you can change that with a script, too bad there isn't a script for the game to run good. :*(

Игра из разряда " Мусорка, но все равно играю". Из плюсов можно выделить действительно оригинальную и уникальную концепцию. На этом пока что все. Неадекватный дисбаланс, переапанные маньяки, баги, лаги, ультранизкий фпс создадут идеальную атмосферу уютному вечеру. Если вас обижают в школе - играйте за маньяка и легко начищайте ж*пы кому вздумается, это будет очень легко. Если вы садист, как и я, для вас есть выжившие, которые, по сути, ничего не смогут, если не наиграли +500 часов. Из видов коммуникации у вас есть только два жеста: "иди туда", "иди сюда", прекрасно, не правда ли? В двух словах: DBD- это игра, в которую не играют разработчики. 100/10
